name: Clergyman
description: Clergyman is a simple 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you will need to pass quite a variety of levels, playing for a priest. Your main mission in this game is to collect certain ecclesiastical items. On each level there are four items collecting those will open the door to the priest's room, and after which - you will be taken to a new level. Be careful on your way are many different obstacles and traps, you need to try to avoid them, because the priest has only one chance to collect all the items. If you perish, do not worry, almost instantly a new level will start and you will be able to try your luck again.
